nodes.text: Skrrll was a criminal who lived on Nar Shaddaa who mugged Loonoo and stole the Smuggler's Guide from him. Shortly after stealing the Smuggler's Guide, Skrrll encountered a small, rib-cat that reminded him of Brutux, a hushstalker they once kept as a pet. Because of the bond the cat developed with them, Skrrll decided to adopt her and named her Warm Face.
